description:
Was looking for a very simple notepad and I am pleased to say that I have found one. 

So simple, just what I wanted.

Also with dark mode and font size which was a bonus.

A very simple notepad with back theme option.
Just what I was looking for, thank you.

Only two things I would like to see improve is :-
1. Load time - needs to be quicker
2. The black colour changes slightly when mouse hovers over - need to stay same colour.
